0.text: Innate: Ezreal generates a stack of Rising Spell Force for each enemy hit by his abilities, lasting for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits, and stacking up to 5 times.
0.html: Innate: Ezreal generates a stack of Rising Spell Force for each enemy hit by his abilities, lasting for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits, and stacking up to 5 times.

1.text: Rising Spell Force: For each stack, Ezreal gains  10% bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 50%.
1.html: Rising Spell Force: For each stack, Ezreal gains  10% bonus attack speed, up to a maximum of 50%.
markedPassages: 10% bonus attack speed

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and applies  on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
0.html: Active: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and applies on-hit and on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness.
markedPassages: on-hit

1.text: If Mystic Shot successfully hits an enemy, the  current cooldowns of Ezreal's abilities, including Mystic Shot's, are reduced by 1.5 seconds.
1.html: If Mystic Shot successfully hits an enemy, the  current cooldowns of Ezreal's abilities, including Mystic Shot's, are reduced by 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: current cooldowns

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires an orb in the target direction that marks the first enemy  champion, epic  monster, or structure hit for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ezreal fires an orb in the target direction that marks the first enemy champion, epic monster, or structure hit for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: champion
monster

1.text: His next basic attack or ability against the target detonates the mark to deal them bonus magic damage.
1.html: His next basic attack or ability against the target detonates the mark to deal them bonus magic damage.

2.text: If the mark was detonated with an ability, Ezreal restores  60 mana plus the mana cost of that ability.
2.html: If the mark was detonated with an ability, Ezreal restores  60 mana plus the mana cost of that ability.
markedPassages: 60 mana

0.text: Active: Ezreal  blinks from his current location to up to 475 units towards the target location, then fires a homing bolt towards the nearest enemy that deals magic damage and  reveals them for 1 second.
0.html: Active: Ezreal blinks from his current location to up to 475 units towards the target location, then fires a homing bolt towards the nearest enemy that deals magic damage and reveals them for 1 second.
markedPassages: blinks
reveals

1.text: Arcane Shift prioritizes firing at the nearest enemy marked by  Essence Flux.
1.html: Arcane Shift prioritizes firing at the nearest enemy marked by Essence Flux.
markedPassages: Essence Flux

2.text: The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability. Arcane Shift will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: The target does not have to be visible to be hit by this ability. Arcane Shift will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability. Arcane Shift will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Ezreal fires an arc of energy in the target direction that briefly grants  sight of its surroundings and deals magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Ezreal fires an arc of energy in the target direction that briefly grants sight of its surroundings and deals magic damage to enemies hit.
markedPassages: sight

1.text: Minions and non-epic  monsters take 50% reduced damage.
1.html: Minions and non-epic monsters take 50% reduced damage.
markedPassages: Minions
monsters

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+35 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+30% attack speed
+300 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Threefold Strike: Basic attacks grant 20 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and, if the target is a champion or a structure, increase base attack damage by 4% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 20% increase. Stacks expire by one every 0.5 seconds when the duration ends.
Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 200% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 3 bonus attack damage, 3 ability haste, and 3 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THREEFOLD STRIKE: Basic attacks grant 20 bonus movement speed for 3 seconds and, if the target is a champion or a structure, increase base attack damage by 4% for the same duration, stacking up to 5 times for a 20% increase. Stacks expire by one every 0.5 seconds when the duration ends.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  833

Keywords

  • tons of damage
  • 3333

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+35 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Muramana at 360 bonus mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1050

+30% armor penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bitter Cold: Dealing ability damage slows affected units by 30% for 1 second.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BITTER COLD: Dealing ability damage  slows affected units by 30% for 1 second.

1.originHTML: +  +  650

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jimmy neutron

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 attack damage
+25 ability haste
+10% life steal

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cleave: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal ( 40% AD / 20% AD) physical damage to other enemies within 350 units of the target damaged. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.
Unique – Carnivorous: Gain 0.5 bonus attack damage whenever you kill a minion, doubled for kills against champions, large monsters, and large minions. This effect stacks up to 40 times, for a total of 20 bonus attack damage. Lose 60% of stacks upon death.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CLEAVE: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal ( 40% AD /  20% AD) physical damage to other enemies within 350 units of the target damaged. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  200

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • rav hydra

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 attack damage
+50 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Lifeline: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs ( 200 / 150) (+ ( 225% / 168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).
Unique: Triggering Lifeline also grants 12% life steal for 5 seconds. After 2 seconds into the duration, taking or dealing damage refreshes this effect to 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – LIFELINE: If you would take magic damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a  shield that absorbs ( 200 /  150) (+ ( 225% /  168.75%) bonus AD) magic damage for 5 seconds (75 second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  375

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 mana
+90 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rock Solid: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
Unique – Winter's Caress: Cripples the attack speed of enemies within 700 units by 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ROCK SOLID: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation  basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
